subject: docs(cleanup): update CLAUDE.md and remove stale references
body:
Updated project structure, milestones, and conventions to reflect the
completed product realignment. Removed all references to deleted
schema/designer/kanban/list/table components. Fixed stale schemaService
reference in viewService comment.
